threads: The situation in Ukraine is deeply concerning. We must support our allies and stand against any aggression. The strength of our military is crucial in maintaining peace and safeguarding our national security. Praying for a peaceful resolution to this conflict.
text: @anarchist_student: u r just a blind sheep following ur masters. u r ignoring the fact that ukraine is a corrupt, capitalist regime. the west is only interested in their own profits. the people of ukraine deserve better than this. communism is the future.

persona.name: Male College Student Internet Language Know-it-all Radical Left
